markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Weapon 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=358)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Agile" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=170" />
<trait label="Finesse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=179" />
<trait label="Thrown 10 ft." url="/Traits.aspx?ID=195" />
<trait label="Versatile S" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=200" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 277 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Favored Weapon** [Alazhra](/Deities.aspx?ID=510), [Alseta](/Deities.aspx?ID=329), [Apep](/Deities.aspx?ID=631), [Ardad Lili](/Deities.aspx?ID=588), [Atropos](/Deities.aspx?ID=533), [Conqueror Worm](/Deities.aspx?ID=234), [Corosbel](/Deities.aspx?ID=418), [Cthulhu](/Deities.aspx?ID=569), [Eritrice](/Deities.aspx?ID=470), [Eyes That Watch](/Deities.aspx?ID=658), [Fandarra](/Deities.aspx?ID=492), [Gravelady's Guard](/Deities.aspx?ID=247), [Gyronna](/Deities.aspx?ID=515), [Kalekot](/Deities.aspx?ID=676), [Kitumu](/Deities.aspx?ID=677), [Lady Razor](/Deities.aspx?ID=661), [Lao Shu Po](/Deities.aspx?ID=312), [Lurlup](/Deities.aspx?ID=504), [Naderi](/Deities.aspx?ID=627), [Nocticula](/Deities.aspx?ID=355), [Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=290), [Shadow Cabinet](/Deities.aspx?ID=372), [Shax](/Deities.aspx?ID=435), [Thamir](/Deities.aspx?ID=566), [The Lantern King](/Deities.aspx?ID=455), [The Last Breath](/Deities.aspx?ID=270), [The Tides of Chaos](/Deities.aspx?ID=698), [Urban Prosperity](/Deities.aspx?ID=256), [Vildeis](/Deities.aspx?ID=487), [Vulot](/Deities.aspx?ID=439), [Ydersius](/Deities.aspx?ID=323), [Yog-Sothoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=580), [Yuelral](/Deities.aspx?ID=463)

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 2 sp

**Damage** 1d4 P

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Hands** 1

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Type** Melee

**Category** Simple

**Group** [Knife](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=9)
</row>

</column>

---

This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

<title level="2">Critical Specialization Effects</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup>

Certain feats, class features, weapon runes, and other effects can grant you additional benefits when you make a Strike with certain weapons and get a critical success. This is called a critical specialization effect. The exact effect depends on which weapon group your weapon belongs to, as listed below. You can always decide not to add the critical specialization effect of your weapon.

[Click here for the full rules on Critical Specialization Effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).

<document level="2" id="weapon-group-9" />

<title level="2">Specific Magic Weapons</title>
[Bloody Fang](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3486), [Serpent Dagger](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2871), [Shard of Self-Destruction](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3516)
name: Dagger
